pr_title: Support system property otel.resource.attributes corresponding to OTEL_RESOURCE_ATTRIBUTES

timeline.message: Support system property otel.resource.attributes corresponding to OTEL_RESOURCE_ATTRIBUTES

timeline.author: trask
trask
trask
trask

timeline.bodyText: We most likely need to later update the code for ConfigBuilder to live right under common, instead of common.export, as this configuration pattern is useful in other scenarios (cc @thisthat )
timeline.author: carlosalberto

timeline.bodyText: We should have this set right in the test itself (the rest of the tests don't need this part).
timeline.author: carlosalberto

replies.author: dengliming

replies.bodyText:
Hmm, isn't that true if the class happens to be loaded before this test is run? It seems like a lucky coincidence that isn't currently happening in the build.
I think to make this test robust we should stick with calling new Builder().readEnvironmentVariables().readSystemProperties().build(); in the test instead of relying on the static instance being loaded after the test.
Also, make sure you reset the value of the property after the test is complete.
replies.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: agree. fixed at lastest commit. Thanks.
replies.author: dengliming

timeline.bodyText: The name of the class seems to be incorrect now. At least Var part.
timeline.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: Ah, now that it supports system properties also, got it (took me some time 😂)
replies.author: trask

replies.bodyText: @iNikem Oh, indeed, I was meant to mention the rename as well.I suggest it being renamed to something like EnvAutodetectResource or AutodetectResource, and update its javadoc to mention that now we do env vars + system properties detection.
replies.author: carlosalberto

replies.bodyText: I would prefer EnvAutodetectResource over AutodetectResource since we only look for a specific env var/sys property.
replies.author: thisthat

replies.bodyText: Already renamed class name EnvVarResource to EnvAutodetectResource and update doc.
replies.author: dengliming

timeline.bodyText:
